title: Log a Facility Maintenance Request
description: An usher notices a broken armrest on a seat and reports it.

tasks.description: Get the exact location of the broken seat (section, row, seat number).
Create a new work order in the facility maintenance system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new maintenance ticket.

tasks.description: Describe the issue ('broken armrest') and set the priority to 'Low'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds the details and priority to the work order.

tasks.description: Assign the work order to the general maintenance crew's queue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent routes the ticket to the correct team.
